languages.text: {n}На лице Торианы отражается энтузиазм истинной ученой.{/n} "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость. Я обратила внимание, что вы приблизили его к себе на церемонии, и для меня было бы честью познакомиться со столь высокопоставленным членом {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Но, пусть род Гапрак и чтит Омниссию, мы — лишь миряне, и нам не дозволено общаться со столь просвещенными слугами Бога-Машины. Ваше милостивое соизволение наполняет мое сердце счастьем".

traits.locale_text: {n}На лице Торианы отражается энтузиазм истинной ученой.{/n} "Благодарю, Ваша милость. Я действительно испытываю любопытство к творениям ксеносов, особенно тем, что несут на себе следы технологических решений. Омниссия велит нам постичь неверные пути, дабы узнать их и не вступить на них".

languages.text: {n}Toriana's face lights up with the enthusiasm of a true scholar.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I noticed that you chose to have him by your side during the ceremony, and I would be honoured to meet such a highly placed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. For, although House Gaprak does indeed follow the Omnissiah, we are but laypeople, and we are not permitted to converse with such enlightened servants of the Machine God. Your gracious assent fills my heart with joy."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице Торианы отражается энтузиазм истинной ученой.{/n} "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость. Я обратила внимание, что вы приблизили его к себе на церемонии, и для меня было бы честью познакомиться со столь высокопоставленным членом {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Но, пусть род Гапрак и чтит Омниссию, мы — лишь миряне, и нам не дозволено общаться со столь просвещенными слугами Бога-Машины. Ваше милостивое соизволение наполняет мое сердце счастьем".

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana's face lights up with the enthusiasm of a true scientist.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Indeed, I feel a certain curiosity about creations of xenos, especially those that bear traces of technological solutions. The Omnissiah tells us to comprehend the wrong paths so that we may learn and avoid treading them."

{n}Toriana's face lights up with the enthusiasm of a true scholar.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I noticed that you chose to have him by your side during the ceremony, and I would be honoured to meet such a highly placed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. For, although House Gaprak does indeed follow the Omnissiah, we are but laypeople, and we are not permitted to converse with such enlightened servants of the Machine God. Your gracious assent fills my heart with joy."

I noticed that you chose to have him by your side during the ceremony, and I would be honoured to meet such a highly placed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. For, although House Gaprak does indeed follow the Omnissiah, we are but laypeople, and we are not permitted to converse with such enlightened servants of the Machine God. Your gracious assent fills my heart with joy."

languages.text: {n}トリアーナの顔が学究の徒としての熱狂で明るくなる。{/n}「感謝します、陛下。式典中のお供にあの方を選んだのだと気づき、あのような高位の{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}員とお目にかかれれば光栄だと思っておりました。というのも、ギャプラック家はいかにも万機神に仕えてきましたが、所詮は平信徒であり、機械神の従者となる権利を与えられた方とお話しすることは許されておりませんので。陛下にお慈悲を与えていただき、この心は喜びにあふれております」
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's face lights up with the enthusiasm of a true scholar.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I noticed that you chose to have him by your side during the ceremony, and I would be honoured to meet such a highly placed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. For, although House Gaprak does indeed follow the Omnissiah, we are but laypeople, and we are not permitted to converse with such enlightened servants of the Machine God. Your gracious assent fills my heart with joy."

traits.locale_text: {n}トリアーナの顔が学究の徒としての熱狂で明るくなる。{/n}「感謝します、陛下。式典中のお供にあの方を選んだのだと気づき、あのような高位の{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}員とお目にかかれれば光栄だと思っておりました。というのも、ギャプラック家はいかにも万機神に仕えてきましたが、所詮は平信徒であり、機械神の従者となる権利を与えられた方とお話しすることは許されておりませんので。陛下にお慈悲を与えていただき、この心は喜びにあふれております」

languages.text: {n}托丽安娜的脸上洋溢着属于真正学者的热情。{/n}“谢谢您，大人。我注意到，您选择让帕斯卡作为您的同伴参加典礼，我很荣幸能见到{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}中地位如此崇高的成员。尽管贾帕克家族是欧姆尼塞亚的信徒，但我们只是普通人，无权与受到万机之神如此贤明的仆人交谈。您的允诺令我欣喜若狂。”
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's face lights up with the enthusiasm of a true scholar.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I noticed that you chose to have him by your side during the ceremony, and I would be honoured to meet such a highly placed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. For, although House Gaprak does indeed follow the Omnissiah, we are but laypeople, and we are not permitted to converse with such enlightened servants of the Machine God. Your gracious assent fills my heart with joy."

traits.locale_text: {n}托丽安娜的脸上洋溢着属于真正学者的热情。{/n}“谢谢您，大人。我注意到，您选择让帕斯卡作为您的同伴参加典礼，我很荣幸能见到{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}中地位如此崇高的成员。尽管贾帕克家族是欧姆尼塞亚的信徒，但我们只是普通人，无权与受到万机之神如此贤明的仆人交谈。您的允诺令我欣喜若狂。”

languages.text: {n}A Toriana se le ilumina el rostro con el entusiasmo de toda una académica.{/n} «Gracias, {mf|milord|milady}. Me percaté de que decidió tenerlo a su lado durante la ceremonia. Sería todo un honor conocer a tan distinguido miembro del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Si bien la casa Gaprak sigue sin lugar a dudas al Omnissiah, no dejamos de practicar el laicismo. Tenemos prohibido conversar con siervos del Dios Máquina tan ilustres. Su amable propuesta me colma de alegría el corazón».
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's face lights up with the enthusiasm of a true scholar.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I noticed that you chose to have him by your side during the ceremony, and I would be honoured to meet such a highly placed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. For, although House Gaprak does indeed follow the Omnissiah, we are but laypeople, and we are not permitted to converse with such enlightened servants of the Machine God. Your gracious assent fills my heart with joy."

traits.locale_text: {n}A Toriana se le ilumina el rostro con el entusiasmo de toda una académica.{/n} «Gracias, {mf|milord|milady}. Me percaté de que decidió tenerlo a su lado durante la ceremonia. Sería todo un honor conocer a tan distinguido miembro del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Si bien la casa Gaprak sigue sin lugar a dudas al Omnissiah, no dejamos de practicar el laicismo. Tenemos prohibido conversar con siervos del Dios Máquina tan ilustres. Su amable propuesta me colma de alegría el corazón».

languages.text: {n}L'enthousiasme d'une véritable érudite illumine le visage de Toriana.{/n} « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai remarqué que vous l'avez invité à vos côtés pendant la cérémonie, ce serait donc pour moi un grand honneur de rencontrer un membre aussi haut placé de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Bien que la maison Gaprak suive l'Omnimessie, nous ne sommes que des profanes et n'avons pas le droit de converser avec de tels serviteurs du Dieu-Machine. Votre assentiment emplit mon cœur de joie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's face lights up with the enthusiasm of a true scholar.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I noticed that you chose to have him by your side during the ceremony, and I would be honoured to meet such a highly placed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. For, although House Gaprak does indeed follow the Omnissiah, we are but laypeople, and we are not permitted to converse with such enlightened servants of the Machine God. Your gracious assent fills my heart with joy."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'enthousiasme d'une véritable érudite illumine le visage de Toriana.{/n} « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai remarqué que vous l'avez invité à vos côtés pendant la cérémonie, ce serait donc pour moi un grand honneur de rencontrer un membre aussi haut placé de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Bien que la maison Gaprak suive l'Omnimessie, nous ne sommes que des profanes et n'avons pas le droit de converser avec de tels serviteurs du Dieu-Machine. Votre assentiment emplit mon cœur de joie. »

languages.text: {n}Torianas Ausdruck erhellt sich mit der Begeisterung einer echten Gelehrten.{/n} "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Mir ist aufgefallen, dass er bei der Zeremonie an Eurer Seite war, und es wäre eine Ehre für mich, ein so hochstehendes Mitglied des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} treffen zu dürfen. Denn obwohl das Haus Gaprak dem Omnissiah folgt, sind wir nur Laien und dürfen mit derart erleuchteten Mitgliedern des Maschinengottes keinen Kontakt pflegen. Eure großzügige Zustimmung erfüllt mein Herz mit Freude."
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's face lights up with the enthusiasm of a true scholar.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I noticed that you chose to have him by your side during the ceremony, and I would be honoured to meet such a highly placed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. For, although House Gaprak does indeed follow the Omnissiah, we are but laypeople, and we are not permitted to converse with such enlightened servants of the Machine God. Your gracious assent fills my heart with joy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Torianas Ausdruck erhellt sich mit der Begeisterung einer echten Gelehrten.{/n} "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Mir ist aufgefallen, dass er bei der Zeremonie an Eurer Seite war, und es wäre eine Ehre für mich, ein so hochstehendes Mitglied des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} treffen zu dürfen. Denn obwohl das Haus Gaprak dem Omnissiah folgt, sind wir nur Laien und dürfen mit derart erleuchteten Mitgliedern des Maschinengottes keinen Kontakt pflegen. Eure großzügige Zustimmung erfüllt mein Herz mit Freude."

languages.text: {n}Toriana'nın yüzünde, gerçek bir âlim şevkiyle güller açıyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Törende yanınızda yer verdiğinizi fark ettim. Böylesine kıdemli bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} mensubuyla tanışma şerefine nail olmak isterim. Sonuçta Gaprak Hanesi olarak Hermesih'in izinde olsak da bizler rahip değiliz, Makine Tanrı'nın aydın hizmetkârlarıyla sohbet etmemiz yasaktır. Buna müsaade ettiğiniz için benden mutlusu yok."
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's face lights up with the enthusiasm of a true scholar.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I noticed that you chose to have him by your side during the ceremony, and I would be honoured to meet such a highly placed member of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. For, although House Gaprak does indeed follow the Omnissiah, we are but laypeople, and we are not permitted to converse with such enlightened servants of the Machine God. Your gracious assent fills my heart with joy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gerçek bir alim şevkiyle Toriana'nın yüzünde güller açıyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Törende yanınızda durmasını seçtiğini fark ettim de, böylesine kıdemli bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} üyesiyle tanışma şerefine nail olmak isterim. Sonuçta Gaprak Hanesi olarak Hermesih'in izinde olsak da, bizler rahip değiliz ve Makine Tanrı'nın aydın hizmetkârlarıyla sohbet etmemiz yasaktır. Buna müsaade ettiğiniz için benden mutlusu yok."
